item.title: Hugo create the public folder but it have not rendered
item.description: Issue When I want to put my public folder to a LAN, the html and hyper links are showed, but the subpages and the CSS (the theme) did not appear. This web can work well with the git page and the local host. Solution First, I commented the baseURL in the config.toml, but it cannot work Final add baseUrl = "//example.org" relativeURLs = true uglyURLs = true into the config.
